PHRASE.LANG: This record player is of a retro design, and as well as looking great in your apartment, plays music from the sound track of Killer Plants from Outer Space. [#Legal]
Ce mange-disque rétro s'intègrera parfaitement dans votre appartement. Il joue la musique de la bande originale de Killer Plants from Outer Space. [#Legal]
Dieser Plattenspieler im Retro-Design, sieht in einem Apartment super aus und spielt außerdem Musik aus dem Soundtrack zu "Killer Plants from Outer Space". [#Legal]
Questo giradischi in stile vintage darà un fantastico tocco retrò al tuo appartamento, e potrai anche usarlo per ascoltare la colonna sonora di Killer Plants from Outer Space. [#Legal]
Este tocadiscos de diseño retro quedará estupendamente en tu apartamento y reproduce música de la banda sonora de Killer Plants from Outer Space. [#Legal]
